de.iabg.mode.event
Class LowerToleranceChangeListener

java.lang.Object
  de.iabg.mode.event.LowerToleranceChangeListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener
public class LowerToleranceChangeListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.event.ChangeListener

This ChangeListener updates the lower color tolerance of the JModeCorrelationPanel whenever the target changes. If the lower color tolerance is greater than the upper color tolerance, the lower color tolerance is set to the same value as the upper color tolerance.

Version:
September 13, 2008
Author:
Adam C. Dick, BSE
